items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for July 31, 2025
items.description: A lady in a lake, A Regency romance scandal, queer love and loss in a drowning world, and more of today's best book deals

items.title: More Adaptations at Prime, Aging Up of Protagonists, and More YA Book News
items.description: YA book news from July includes new research on how YA protagonists have gotten older, new crossover imprints, and more.

items.title: 5 Fat-Positive Queer Romance Books, Because Bodies Aren’t a Trend
items.description: These queer romance books that see fat bodies as lovable and desirable feel healing, especially as social media is overrun by anti-fatness.

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.title: Steampunk’s Grittier Cousin: A Dieselpunk Reading List
items.description: Learn more about dieselpunk, steampunk's darker and dirtier cousin. Plus, a reading list of some of the best examples of the subgenre.
